Google Docs Templates – Download, Edit, and Use for your Purposes

The time for the usual Microsoft Word is over! You no longer need to spend hours on an invoice, resume writing, training plan, or developing booklets for a themed event. With the help of google docs templates, you can solve the problem in a matter of minutes.

Whether you are working as a sales manager, personal trainer, or foreign language tutor, our platform has layouts to help you in your professional life. Free google docs templates are developed by designers taking into account the specifics, stylistic and graphic requirements for a particular type of document. Thus, you get a layout of the document you need with a prepared structure and parameters. Convenient, isn't it?

Do you need to add any information, image, or company logo to your google document? No problem! Google docs templates include elements that you can edit, swap, or delete as you see fit. You can change any document settings, for example, the font size of the text, the number of cells in the table, etc. Download templates for google docs and use them anytime, even without an internet connection.

How Can you Use Google Docs Templates?

The gallery of google docs templates includes over 2000 unique free themes that are great for both commercial materials and personal daily tasks. You can use any layout as a constructor: add the necessary information, an image or a photo, and voila - the document is ready! You can save the google docs template in any format, send it electronically to colleagues, or download and print it.

Our platform provides an extensive catalog of templates for creating the most popular documents, namely:

  • Invoice: these google docs templates will help you simplify the process of registration and invoicing for the provision of any services, for example, for website development, delivery of goods, etc. You can easily adapt Invoice professional free templates for google docs for your tasks, the specifics of the company's activities.
  • Newspaper: google docs templates in the form of a traditional newspaper are a great solution for an original presentation of the company's achievements, and for designing a newsletter for clients. Using this template, you can also create your student, entertainment, and commercial newspaper.
  • Missing: if you've lost a pet or a close person has disappeared, every minute counts. Use missing poster templates to speed up your search. You only need to upload a photo and add data. The layouts are suitable for social media posting and prints.
  • Workout plan: thanks to this google docs template, you can plan workouts for a week/month/year, track results, control body parameters, monitor diet.
  • Resume and cover letter: well-designed, structured resume templates will help you stand out in the interview and convince the recruiter of your professionalism. Download a free google resume template and get your dream job.

Also, more google docs templates are presented on our platform: on the site, you can download layouts for managing personal finances, family budget, book presentation, creating information brochures, booklets, business plans. Do you need to control the project implementation process and staff compliance with the deadline? No problem! Free google sheets timeline templates with the sharing option is a great tool which you can correctly estimate the labor costs for a particular task, and keep control of project execution.

Do you need to present a company's development strategy, commercial proposal, or quarterly report with key sales figures? Excellent! Use free google slides templates for business for this, and your presentation will be appreciated. This category of google slides includes everything necessary for a convincing presentation of information: diagrams, graphs, icons, flowcharts, tables, which you can edit based on the tasks set. Thanks to exclusive thematic infographics, your presentation will definitely not go unnoticed.

To download free google slides templates is also a great solution for those who want to present their clients with a portfolio of their design or web projects, photographs, it is interesting to tell about themselves at an interview, to impress at a conference and any other events. The specially created category “all about me google slides template” will help you to present yourself in a winning way. A vibrant theme with graphic elements, a layout with an abstract background, or sophisticated minimalism? Thanks to a wide variety of templates for google slides, you can choose the style, color scheme of the presentation that appeals to you the most.

For example, if you want to inform your clients about the latest achievements of the company in an extraordinary way, you can use the newspaper google slides templates.

This google slide template is completely identical to typical newspaper publications and includes elements such as journalistic columns, headers and footers, headings, and a place for images. Google slides templates are available for you in the form of a student, medical, informational, business, entertainment newspaper. You can change fonts, add images, photos, icons, and anything else you need to accomplish your tasks. Download ppt template for google slides, edit and create your newspaper.

You can also add a company logo and any other elements of the corporate identity to the slides. It's very easy!

What are the Benefits of Using Google Docs and Slides Templates?

Google Docs and Slides Templates is an effective tool for anyone looking to automate the creation of presentations, invoices, corporate or personal documents. By using layouts of documents and slides with an already developed design concept, structure, and parameters, you save your time.

Using google docs and slides templates for professional or personal purposes also gives you many benefits, for example:

  1. Hundreds of professional templates for free. You get well-designed, structured google docs and slides templates for free. What could be even better?
  2. Collaborate on a presentation. Multiple users can make changes to google slide templates at the same time. In this way, you can involve your team members in the development of the project.
  3. Automatic saving. Templates for google slides and google docs are saved in the cloud storage. To access the document, you do not need to download additional software or make complex settings.
  4. Edit the template whenever you want. Google docs and slides templates have graphic elements that you can edit, delete, swap as you see fit. Do you want to see the history of changes in google slides? Thanks to the automatic saving of all changes, you can always restore previous versions of the document.
  5. Access to google docs and slides templates from any device. Do you want to view slides from your smartphone? No problem! Since the files are saved in the cloud storage, you can open and make changes to google docs slides from your smartphone, laptop, tablet. You can also download google docs and slides templates and work with files without an internet connection.

Google docs and slides templates are so easy to understand and customize that even a child can easily figure them out. You do not need to have the additional skills of a designer, copywriter to professionally bring your ideas or project to life!

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

1. How to download a template for google docs?

It's simple! Select in the google docs gallery a template that best suits your needs, clicks the "download" button. The Google docs template will open in your browser. To be able to edit a document without access to the Internet, select the "enable offline access" item in the settings.

2. Can I make changes to google docs slides templates?

Of course! You can edit templates as you need. All graphic objects, icons in templates can be rearranged, deleted, formatted. You can also change the order of the pages of the slides in the presentation, add any images, logo, links, videos, change the background of the theme. Experiment!

3. Can I convert google slides templates to PowerPoint?

Yes, this option is available to users. You can convert google slides templates to PowerPoint and vice versa, export files to the most popular formats (for example, pdf, txt, .jpg, png, .svg).

4. How do I get even more google docs templates and slides?

On our platform, you can find the best google docs templates and presentation slides themes. Select the category you need, and the system will automatically give you the top templates. We recommend paying attention to such themes of templates for google documents as Invoice, Missing, Workout plan, Newspaper. Also, other google docs templates are presented on our platform: on the website, you can download layouts for managing personal finances, family budget, book presentation, creating a professional resume, information brochures, booklets, business plans, and others.

5. Can I use Google slides templates in the Keynote app for Mac, iOS, and iCloud?

Absolutely! Google slides templates are compatible with Keynote. If you want to work with templates on a MacBook, download the file and open it in the program window.
